Class PDFPageBase

All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:
PDFPage, PDFPageTree
public abstract class PDFPageBase
extends PDFDictionary

Implements the Page Base Node to accomodate Inheritance of Page Attributes (see Table 3.17)
